languages.text: "Конечно. Это символически подчеркнет вашу связь с определенными слоями или организациями, к которым принадлежат ваши спутники. За вами будут внимательно наблюдать и запомнят, кого вы приблизили к себе. Потому таких соратников и должно быть не более двух — иначе это не будет уникальной милостью".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно. Это символически подчеркнет вашу связь с определенными слоями или организациями, к которым принадлежат ваши спутники. За вами будут внимательно наблюдать и запомнят, кого вы приблизили к себе. Потому таких соратников и должно быть не более двух — иначе это не будут уникальной милостью".

languages.text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Это символически подчеркнет вашу связь с определенными слоями или организациями, к которым принадлежат ваши спутники. За вами будут внимательно наблюдать и запомнят, кого вы приблизили к себе. Потому таких соратников и должно быть не более двух — иначе это не будет уникальной милостью".

traits.locale_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favor."

"Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favor."

All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

"Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

languages.text: 「もちろんです。この行為は、ロード・キャプテンのお仲間が所属する特定の階級または集団との結びつきを象徴することになります。全ての視線が陛下に注がれ、人民は側近に選ばれた者を記憶するでしょう。そのようなわけですから、選べるのは2名までです。そうでなければ、特別な支持の表明とはなりませんので、ひとりだけというのも望ましくありません」
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです。この行為は、ロード・キャプテンのお仲間が所属する特定の階級または集団との結びつきを象徴することになります。全ての視線が陛下に注がれ、人民は側近に選ばれた者を記憶するでしょう。そのようなわけですから、選べるのは2名までです。そうでなければ、特別な支持の表明とはなりませんので、ひとりだけというのも望ましくありません」

languages.text: “很重要。如此重大的场合，您挑选出陪伴您出席的同伴，就相当于在向外界宣告您与这名同伴所属的群体关系匪浅。您是整场活动的焦点，人们也会记住您选择了谁作为您最亲密的盟友。之所以只能选择两名同伴，意义也在于此——不是雨露均沾，而是亲疏有别。”
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: “很重要。如此重大的场合，您挑选出陪伴您出席的同伴，就相当于在向外界宣告您与这名同伴所属的群体关系匪浅。您是整场活动的焦点，人们也会记住您选择了谁作为您最亲密的盟友。之所以只能选择两名同伴，意义也在于此——不是雨露均沾，而是亲疏有别。”

languages.text: «Desde luego. Es un gesto simbólico que enfatizará su relación con los grupos o las clases a las que pertenecen sus acompañantes. Todas las miradas estarán dirigidas a usted y la gente recordará a quiénes considera sus aliados más firmes. Por eso no puede haber más de dos, porque si no, no será una muestra de favor».
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: «Desde luego. Es un gesto simbólico que enfatizará su relación con los grupos o las clases a las que pertenecen sus acompañantes. Todas las miradas estarán dirigidas a usted y la gente recordará a quiénes considera sus aliados más firmes. Por eso no puede haber más de dos, porque si no, no será una muestra de favor».

languages.text: « C'est un geste symbolique qui pourrait vous permettre de resserrer vos liens avec les classes ou groupes auxquels appartiennent vos compagnons. Tous les yeux seront rivés sur vous, et chacun se souviendra de ceux que vous considérez comme vos alliés les plus proches. C'est d'ailleurs pour cette raison qu'il ne peut y en avoir que deux. Autrement, ce ne serait pas autant un privilège. »
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un geste symbolique qui pourrait vous permettre de resserrer vos liens avec les classes ou groupes auxquels appartiennent vos compagnons. Tous les yeux seront rivés sur vous, et chacun se souviendra de ceux que vous considérez comme vos alliés les plus proches. C'est d'ailleurs pour cette raison qu'il ne peut y en avoir que deux. Autrement, ce ne serait pas autant un privilège. »

languages.text: "Unbedingt. Diese symbolische Geste verdeutlicht Eure Verbindung mit bestimmten Klassen oder Gruppierungen, zu denen Eure Gefährten gehören. Alle Augen werden auf Euch gerichtet sein, und man wird sich daran erinnern, wen Ihr als engste Verbündete wählt. Darum dürfen es auch höchstens zwei sein – sonst geht Eure Gunst daraus nicht klar hervor."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: "Unbedingt. Diese symbolische Geste verdeutlicht Eure Verbindung mit bestimmten Klassen oder Gruppierungen, zu denen Eure Gefährten gehören. Alle Augen werden auf Euch gerichtet sein, und man wird sich daran erinnern, wen Ihr als engste Verbündete wählt. Darum dürfen es auch höchstens zwei sein – sonst geht Eure Gunst daraus nicht klar hervor."

languages.text: "Olmaz olur mu? Bu sembolik jest, seçilen yoldaşlarınızın ait olduğu sınıf veya gruplarla olan bağlantınızı irdeleyecektir. Tüm gözler üzerinizde olacak; insanlar, en yakın müttefikleriniz olarak kimi seçtiğinizi akıllarında bulunduracak. Bu yüzden iki yoldaş seçiliyor. Daha fazlasının seçilmesi, durumu anlamsızlaştırır."
languages.original_text: "Absolutely. This symbolic gesture will accentuate your connection to certain classes or parties to which your companions belong. All eyes will be on you, and people will remember whom you chose as your closest allies. That is why there can be no more than two — or it won't be a unique show of favour."

traits.locale_text: "Olmaz olur mu? Bu sembolik jest, seçilen yoldaşlarınızın ait olduğu sınıf veya gruplarla olan bağlantınızı irdeleyecektir. Tüm gözler üzerinizde olacak ve insanlar, en yakın müttefikleriniz olarak kimi seçtiğinizi hatırlayacak. Bu yüzden ikiden fazla olması, durumu anlamsızlaştırır."
